expression.expression-string: Unirest.post(api + domain + endpoint) .basicAuth("api", key) .queryString("from", email.getFrom()) .queryString("to", email.getTo()) .queryString("cc", email.getCc()) .queryString("bcc", email.getBcc()) .queryString("subject", email.getSubject()) .queryString("text", email.getBody()) .asString()

Unirest.post(api + domain + endpoint) .basicAuth("api", key) .queryString("from", email.getFrom()) .queryString("to", email.getTo()) .queryString("cc", email.getCc()) .queryString("bcc", email.getBcc()) .queryString("subject", email.getSubject()) .queryString("text", email.getBody()) .asJson()

response = Unirest.post(api + domain + endpoint) .basicAuth("api", key) .queryString("from", email.getFrom()) .queryString("to", email.getTo()) .queryString("cc", email.getCc()) .queryString("bcc", email.getBcc()) .queryString("subject", email.getSubject()) .queryString("text", email.getBody()) .asJson()
